translated: The essence is the abode of non-arising.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni nam nam mkha'i snying po'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni nam nam mkha'i snying po'o //
translated: He who has that is Ākāśagarbha.

original: chos rnam pa ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba 'dis chos chos thams cad gcig tu byed pa'i mi phyed pa'i khu tshur gang la mnga' ba de ni rdo rje khu tshur te /
analyzed: chos rnam pa ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba 'dis chos chos thams cad gcig tu byed pa'i mi phyed pa'i khu tshur gang la mnga' ba de ni rdo rje khu tshur te /
translated: The one who has the vajra fist that unifies all phenomena into one is Vajrapāṇi.

original: gang zhig mi slu bden de nyid //
analyzed: gang zhig mi slu bden de nyid //
translated: The one who is undeceiving and true

original: rdo rje'i khu tshur de bshad do //🔽zhes lung las gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje'i khu tshur de bshad do // zhes lung las gsungs pa yin no //
translated: is explained to be Vajrapāṇi.

original: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dpal gang la mnga' ba de ni 'jam dpal te /
analyzed: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dpal gang la mnga' ba de ni 'jam dpal te /
translated: The one who has the glory of gentleness is Mañjuśrī.

original: gnyis su med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i rgyu las nges par 'byung ba'i de kho na nyid kyis nyon mongs pa sra zhing rtsub pa dang bral la /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i rgyu las nges par 'byung ba'i de kho na nyid kyis nyon mongs pa sra zhing rtsub pa dang bral la /
translated: He is free from the hardness and roughness of afflictions that arise from the cause of abiding in the nondual perfection of wisdom.

original: na tshod lo brgyad pa'i gzhon nu'i gzugs mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: na tshod lo brgyad pa'i gzhon nu'i gzugs mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He has the youthful form of an eight-year-old.

original: sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i ngag tshul gang la mnga' ba de ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i ngag tshul gang la mnga' ba de ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
translated: The one who has the method of speech for immediately entering the mandala of the wheel of Dharma after generating the Thought is the one who turns the wheel of Dharma immediately after generating the Thought.

original: nam mkha' ni go 'byed pa ste mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni go 'byed pa ste mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: Space is the opening, the wisdom of equality.

original: de nyid kyi mdzod 'di la mnga' bas na nam mkha'i mdzod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi mdzod 'di la mnga' bas na nam mkha'i mdzod do //
translated: Since he has the treasure of that, he is the Sky Treasure.

original: phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu ni bdud thams cad de /
analyzed: phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu ni bdud thams cad de /
translated: The aggregates, the afflictions, the Lord of Death, and the son of gods are all demons.

original: de'i stobs ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i stobs ni nus pa'o //
translated: Their power is their ability.

original: de rab tu 'joms shing bzlog par mdzad pa'i ngag tshul gang la mnga' ba de ni bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: de rab tu 'joms shing bzlog par mdzad pa'i ngag tshul gang la mnga' ba de ni bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'o //
translated: The one who has the method of speech for completely destroying and turning back that is the one who completely destroys all the powers of the demons.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams @30b ni sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams @30b ni sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin te /
translated: These bodhisattvas are the branches of practice.

original: lung las dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: lung las dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The scriptures say that the bodhisattvas are the guardians of the city of the sublime Dharma.

original: gang ga'i klung gi bye ma nyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang zhes bya ba 'dis kyang sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: gang ga'i klung gi bye ma nyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang zhes bya ba 'dis kyang sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstan pa yin te /
translated: The phrase “as many as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River” indicates the tathāgatas who are the limbs of the practice.🔽The text states:

original: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
analyzed: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
translated: “Jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ—

original: lus la sangs rgyas kun gzhug go //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus la sangs rgyas kun gzhug go // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: I cause all the buddhas to enter my body.”

original: bcom ldan 'das dus de'i tshe 'og min gyi gnas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang ba dang ; lhan cig pa zhugs she na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dus de'i tshe 'og min gyi gnas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang ba dang ; lhan cig pa zhugs she na /
translated: The Bhagavān entered into the abode of the Akaniṣṭha realm in such a way that the tathāgatas filled it completely.🔽The text states:

original: de yang 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpe gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpe gsungs pa yin te /
translated: “It was like this . . .”

original: lcang lo can na bzhugs pa'i sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi tshul 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang bas kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la ji ltar bdag na rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can na yang dag par sdud pa'i dus🔽su 'dzam bu'i gling til gyi gang bu til gyi sa bon gyis yongs su gang ba bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kun du gang bar bdag cag la snang la /
analyzed: lcang lo can na bzhugs pa'i sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi tshul 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang bas kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la ji ltar bdag na rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can na yang dag par sdud pa'i dus su 'dzam bu'i gling til gyi gang bu til gyi sa bon gyis yongs su gang ba bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kun du gang bar bdag cag la snang la /
translated: Vajradhara, who is the lord of the tenth stage abiding in Alakavati, said to the great bodhisattvas, such as Samantabhadra, “Just as I see the entire world system of a billion universes filled with tathagatas, like a grove of reeds, in the palace of the king of the gods, when the sutra was compiled in the past,🔽I see the entire world system of a billion universes filled with tathagatas, like a grove of reeds, in the palace of the king of the gods, when the sutra is compiled in the present.

original: 'og min gyi gnas su ston par mdzad pa'i dus su yang bdag cag gis de bzhin du mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'og min gyi gnas su ston par mdzad pa'i dus su yang bdag cag gis de bzhin du mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: I see the entire world system of a billion universes filled with tathagatas, like a grove of reeds, in the palace of the king of the gods, when the sutra is compiled in the future.”

original: ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig tu bzhugs sam zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig tu bzhugs sam zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Do the tathagatas abide in one body?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: No, it is said that “the tathagatas have immeasurable bodies.”

original: ji lta bu zhe na de rnams dang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na de rnams dang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: What are they like? It is said “those bodies.”

original: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gzhan dag kyang zhes ston te /
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gzhan dag kyang zhes ston te /
translated: The word “also” indicates others.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sku las kyang zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sku las kyang zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
translated: When this is explained, it is said that “from the body of each Tathāgata”

original: yang na ji bzhin thun mong du gyur pas na thabs cig pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang na ji bzhin thun mong du gyur pas na thabs cig pa yin zhe na /
translated: Or, they are together because they are the same.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The phrase “in the Buddha-land” and so on is stated.

original: de dag ni zhes bya ba byed par gyur pa rnams kyi dbang las zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de dag ni zhes bya ba byed par gyur pa rnams kyi dbang las zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The phrase “from those” up to “from the power of the Tathāgatas” is stated.

original: ji ltar na de dag gi dbang las rag las pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na de dag gi dbang las rag las pa yin zhe na /
translated: How are they dependent on the power of those?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sku las kyang zhes pa la sogs pa dang / chos kyi tshul 'di nyid 'chad do zhes bya @31a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sku las kyang zhes pa la sogs pa dang / chos kyi tshul 'di nyid 'chad do zhes bya @31a * //
translated: The phrase “from the body of each Tathāgata” and so on, and the phrase “expounds this very Dharma method” and so on, are stated.

original: la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces smos pa ni rgyud de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgongs pa gcig gis ston par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces smos pa ni rgyud de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgongs pa gcig gis ston par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: The phrase “all Tathāgatas” is stated because the continuum of those Tathāgatas is the same, and the Tathāgatas teach with a single intention.

original: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang man ngag phan tshun las nges pa skyed de bsam pa gcig gis dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la sogs pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang man ngag phan tshun las nges pa skyed de bsam pa gcig gis dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la sogs pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: It also teaches that those who wish to practice the mantra door should generate certainty from the instructions and engage in drawing the mandala with a single intention.

original: rang nyid dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad bstan nas /
analyzed: rang nyid dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad bstan nas /
translated: Having taught Vairocana endowed with the perfect benefit for oneself and others,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad dang rnam par snang mdzad chen po smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad dang rnam par snang mdzad chen po smos pa yin no //
translated: then the Bhagavān Vairocana, the great Vairocana, abides in the mind of all tathāgatas. This is the statement of Vairocana and the great Vairocana.

original: 'di gnyis kyi khyad par ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di gnyis kyi khyad par ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the difference between these two?

original: 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sku'i ngo bo nyid ni rnams par snang mdzad yin la /
analyzed: 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sku'i ngo bo nyid ni rnams par snang mdzad yin la /
translated: The essence of the five tathāgata bodies of the one who fully and completely awakens to buddhahood in the Akaniṣṭha realm is Vairocana.

original: de nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa /
translated: That itself is the cause for generating the form of the nondual mind and mental factors as Vairocana, Vajrasattva, and so on.

original: chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshan nyid can ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshan nyid can ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po yin no //
translated: The basic field of phenomena, which has the characteristic of being without beginning or end, is the great Vairocana.

original: de ni dmigs su med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin chos bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi mthus skal ba ji lta ba ba bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni dmigs su med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin chos bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi mthus skal ba ji lta ba ba bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: By the power of the pristine wisdom of the selflessness of phenomena, which is the nature of great, nonconceptual compassion, in order to ripen sentient beings in accordance with their fortune,

original: phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med pa'i bar gyi dus thams cad du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skus bzhugs par mdzad pas de'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med pa'i bar gyi dus thams cad du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skus bzhugs par mdzad pas de'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: he remains in the form of Vairocana and so on for all time, until the end of time. Therefore it is said, “He remains forever like the realm of space” and so on.

original: rtag tu dri mad thugs rje'i shugs las 'byung //
analyzed: rtag tu dri mad thugs rje'i shugs las 'byung //
translated: He always arises from the force of stainless compassion.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
translated: Since it is the realm of space and also everything,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de /
translated: it is the realm of space of everything.

original: der rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang gsung dang @31b thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: der rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang gsung dang @31b thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That which always abides in that, and is like the vajra of body, speech, and mind, is called “always abiding like the realm of space, and being like the vajra of body, speech, and mind.”

original: ji ltar na 'di nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du rtag tu bzhugs shing sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'di nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du rtag tu bzhugs shing sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that this always abides like the realm of space, and is like the vajra of body, speech, and mind?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said, “the tathāgatas,” and so on.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang gdul bya rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang gdul bya rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: The tathāgatas Vairocana and so on, and those to be trained, are all tathāgatas.

original: de rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur pas /
analyzed: de rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur pas /
translated: Since they abide in the manner of the buddha families of the tathāgatas of the ten directions,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the entry into the sameness of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug par gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa nyid de da rgyur gyur pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug par gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa nyid de da rgyur gyur pas so //
translated: The entry into the sameness of all the Tathagatas is the entry into the sameness of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni rdo rje'i dbyings so //🔽rdo rje'i dbyings kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni rdo rje'i dbyings so // rdo rje'i dbyings kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
translated: The secret of the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas and of Vajrasattva and so on is the vajra realm.🔽It is the vajra realm, and it is all of them,

original: rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad de /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad de /
translated: therefore it is the vajra realm of all.

original: de rnams kyi thugs su chud pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs su chud pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud rtogs pa'o //
translated: The realization of that is the understanding of the mindstreams of those to be trained.

original: ye shes sems dpa' ni gang gi phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin la /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' ni gang gi phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin la /
translated: The knowledge being is Vajrasattva,

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing /
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing /
translated: therefore this Blessed One always abides like the realm of space.

original: sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje yin no //
analyzed: sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje yin no //
translated: It is the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: This Bhagavān is not only in the manner of Vajrasattva,

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi tshul gyis kyang bzhugs pas nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi tshul gyis kyang bzhugs pas nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: but also in the manner of Vajraratna, therefore it says “in the realm of space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni nam mkha' sdo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / shel gyi mdog can gyi 'od zer rnams te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni nam mkha' sdo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / shel gyi mdog can gyi 'od zer rnams te /
translated: The entire realm of space is the light rays of blue, red, yellow, and crystal colors.

original: de rnams kyi shin tu phra mo ni phra rab rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi shin tu phra mo ni phra rab rnams so //
translated: Their extreme subtlety is the atoms.

original: de nyid ni rdul te gcig tu byas nas rdo rje rin chen gyi gzugs su bskyed pa ni rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs so //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdul te gcig tu byas nas rdo rje rin chen gyi gzugs su bskyed pa ni rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs so //
translated: That itself is the dust, which is made into one and generated in the form of Vajraratna, which is the vajra empowerment.

original: de 'byung ba'i ye shes de ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de 'byung ba'i ye shes de ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i ye shes so //
translated: The gnosis that arises from that is the gnosis that arises from the vajra empowerment of the atoms of all the realms of space.

original: de nyid ni snying po ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni snying po ste /
translated: That itself is the essence,

original: bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i @32a * //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i @32a * //
translated: That which is the basis of generation is space.🔽

original: dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po ste /
analyzed: dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po ste /
translated: That which is the place of generation is the essence of wisdom arisen from the blessing of the atoms of the entire realm of space,

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzugs rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzugs rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of the jewel-vajra-seal, the form of the wish-fulfilling gem marked with a five-pronged vajra.

original: rdo rje rin chen de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: From that jewel-vajra, the Tathagatas equal to the atoms of all world-realms emerge,

original: des kyang sems can gyi don mdzad nas gcig tu gyur pa ste nam mkha'i snying po'i skus rin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar mdzad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: des kyang sems can gyi don mdzad nas gcig tu gyur pa ste nam mkha'i snying po'i skus rin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar mdzad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and having performed the welfare of sentient beings, they become one, and by the body of Akashagarbha, they become the universal monarch of the jewel lineage.🔽In order to teach that, he says, “All the Tathagatas,” and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni ji skad du bzhad pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni ji skad du bzhad pa rnams so //
translated: All the Tathagatas are those who have been mentioned.

original: de rnams kyi mtha' yas pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid de /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtha' yas pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid de /
translated: Their infinity is the infinity of all the transcendent lords.

original: de rgyur pa nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de rgyur pa nyid kyis na /
translated: Since that is the cause,

original: rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i rin po che yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i rin po che yin te /
translated: it is the jewel of the consecration of the gnosis of the great vajra.

original: rin po che'i rigs ni rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs ni rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The jewel lineage is the consecration of the gnosis of the vajra jewel.

original: de'i rgyu'i rin po chen ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs kyi bdag po'i tshul te 'di dag thams cad yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu'i rin po chen ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs kyi bdag po'i tshul te 'di dag thams cad yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The jewel cause of that is the nature of the lord of the lineage of noble Ākāśagarbha. All of this should be understood.

original: ji skad du bshad ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi bdag po'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi bdag po'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that this Bhagavān, as has been explained, is the nature of the lord of the lotus lineage,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “all the realm of space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros shing khyab pa yang yin la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros shing khyab pa yang yin la /
translated: It is also the pervasiveness and pervasion of all the realm of space.

original: de bzhin nyid kyang yin pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang yin pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Since it is suchness, it is the suchness of all the realm of space.

original: de'i ye shes ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: Its pristine wisdom is the pristine wisdom of the suchness of all the realm of space.

original: padma lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab cing dngos po thams cad nges par bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: padma lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab cing dngos po thams cad nges par bskyed pa'o //
translated: It pervades all the realm of space in the manner of lotus light rays, and it definitely produces all things.

original: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: Its manifest, complete enlightenment is its actualization.

original: des mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Its manifest, complete enlightenment is the nature of manifest enlightenment, the form of the vajra lotus seal.

original: phyag rgya'i gzugs de las @32b de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa byung nas 'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad de /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i gzugs de las @32b de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa byung nas 'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad de /
translated: From that form of the seal, infinite transcendent ones emerge and perform the welfare of living beings.

original: gcig tu gyur pa las 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur to zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig tu gyur pa las 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur to zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that he became the Lord of the World through becoming one,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “the seal of all the Tathāgatas, pure in nature, of all the Dharmas, the activity of the world, the worship of the Buddhas, the great seal of the Lord of the World.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The great seal of the Lord of the World is the intrinsic reality of all the Tathāgatas.

original: de'i dag pa ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dag pa ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
translated: Its purity is the absence of afflictions together with their traces.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi ngo bo nyid dag pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi ngo bo nyid dag pa'o //
translated: Since it has that intrinsic reality, it is the intrinsic reality of all the Tathāgatas.

original: ngo bo nyid dag pa des 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos thams cad gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dag pa des 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos thams cad gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That which is the intrinsic reality of all the Tathāgatas, pure in nature, of all the Dharmas, the activity of the world, and the worship of the Buddhas, is called the great seal of the Lord of the World.

original: 'dis ni chos kyi skur dbang bskur ba dang / padma'i rigs kyi bdag po'i rang bzhin yin par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos kyi skur dbang bskur ba dang / padma'i rigs kyi bdag po'i rang bzhin yin par ston to //
translated: This demonstrates the consecration into the Dharma Body and the nature of the Lord of the Lotus Family.

original: de ni padma'i rigs kyi sprul pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid kyi gdul bya'i spyod pa'i gzhung gis sems can gyi don mdzad par ston pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni padma'i rigs kyi sprul pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid kyi gdul bya'i spyod pa'i gzhung gis sems can gyi don mdzad par ston pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: The passage beginning “pervading the entire realm of space” shows the performance of the welfare of sentient beings by the reality of the gnosis emanations of the lotus family, through the scriptures of conduct for the disciples.

original: de ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa yang yin la /
translated: It is so called because it pervades the entire realm of space and🔽because it is perfectly revealed in all forms.

original: gzugs thams cad du yang dag par bstan pa yang yin pas de skad ces bya sba dang / de mkhyen pa ni nger nges pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs thams cad du yang dag par bstan pa yang yin pas de skad ces bya sba dang / de mkhyen pa ni nger nges pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of that is ascertained.

original: des sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'dul ba ni phan pa ma yin pa las bzlog nas phan pa la nges par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: des sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'dul ba ni phan pa ma yin pa las bzlog nas phan pa la nges par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The training of the entire realm of sentient beings without exception is the turning away from what is not beneficial and the definite application to what is beneficial.

original: de nyid ni spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni spyod pa'o //
translated: That itself is conduct.

original: de'i mchog tu gyur pa ni zla med pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i mchog tu gyur pa ni zla med pa'o ;
translated: The supreme of that is peerless.

original: /'dis ni bcom ldan 'das padma'i rigs kyi rang bzhin yin par ston to //
analyzed: /'dis ni bcom ldan 'das padma'i rigs kyi rang bzhin yin par ston to //
translated: This shows that the Blessed One is of the nature of the lotus family.

original: las kyi rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du gyur pas kyang /
analyzed: las kyi rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du gyur pas kyang /
translated: And also, having become a universal monarch of the karma family,

original: de nam mkha' thams cad khyab par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nam mkha' thams cad khyab par bstan pa ni /
translated: he shows that he pervades all of space.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: The words “thus have I heard” and so on show that

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i bka' ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i bka' ste /
translated: the word of all the tathāgatas is not empty, that is, it is not without result.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig / mchod pa thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cig ces bya ba'o //🔽de mdzad pa'i dang tshul gang la yod @33a * //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig / mchod pa thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cig ces bya ba'o // de mdzad pa'i dang tshul gang la yod @33a * //
translated: The meaning is that he should benefit all sentient beings and that he should worship all the tathāgatas with all forms of worship.

original: pa ni / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i don yod par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: pa ni / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i don yod par mdzad pa ste /
translated: The one who does this is the one who makes the word of all the tathāgatas not empty.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' don yod par mdzad pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' don yod par mdzad pa nyid do //
translated: His very essence is that he makes the word of all the tathāgatas not empty.

original: des thams cad mnyam pa med pa yi la mnyam pa med pa nyid kyis na bla na med pa yang yin te /
analyzed: des thams cad mnyam pa med pa yi la mnyam pa med pa nyid kyis na bla na med pa yang yin te /
translated: Since he is the one who makes all things equal, he is also unsurpassed.

original: rnam par thams cad pa'i phrin las 'di mnga' bas na thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thams cad pa'i phrin las 'di mnga' bas na thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa'o //
translated: Since he possesses this activity of all aspects, he performs various activities that are equal to, incomparable to, and superior to all.

original: 'dis ni 'di na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams shing las kyi rigs su las kyi dkyil 'khor lo sa rgyur ba yin par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams shing las kyi rigs su las kyi dkyil 'khor lo sa rgyur ba yin par ston to //
translated: This shows that he holds the vajra cross and is the lord of the karma mandala in the karma family.🔽Similarly, he holds the vajra cross and performs the various activities of beings there.

original: de bzhin du sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams te der sems can sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad do zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa snying po'i don bstan pa'i sgo nas de'i snying po rnams bstan pa dang ;
analyzed: de bzhin du sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams te der sems can sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad do zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa snying po'i don bstan pa'i sgo nas de'i snying po rnams bstan pa dang ;
translated: By all tathagatas and so forth, he teaches the essence mantras of Vajrasattva and so forth by teaching the meaning of the essence mantras.

original: tshul des rnam par snang mdzad chen po yin par gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: tshul des rnam par snang mdzad chen po yin par gsungs pa yin te /
translated: By that method, he declares that he is Great Vairochana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: By all tathagatas he means Vairochana and so forth.

original: byang chub chen po ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams te ;
analyzed: byang chub chen po ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams te ;
translated: The great enlightenment is the nondual mind and mental factors that have the nature of Akṣobhya.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid du sems dpa' brtan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen por sems dpa' brtan pa ste /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid du sems dpa' brtan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen por sems dpa' brtan pa ste /
translated: The mind of the firm bodhisattva that has the nature of that is the firm mind of the great enlightenment of all tathāgatas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is what the term “vajrasattva” means.

original: yang na de nyid ni brtan zhing mi gyo ba ste /
analyzed: yang na de nyid ni brtan zhing mi gyo ba ste /
translated: Alternatively, that itself is firm and unmoving.

original: de las sprul pa'i sems dpa' ni brtan pa'i sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de las sprul pa'i sems dpa' ni brtan pa'i sems dpa' ste /
translated: The emanated bodhisattva from that is the firm bodhisattva.

original: badzra satva zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra satva zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what the term “vajrasattva” means.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba ni spyan 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba ni spyan 'dren pa'o //
translated: The invocation of all tathāgatas is the invocation.

original: de'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ste /
translated: The commitment of that is not to transgress.

original: badzra r'a dza zhes bya'o //
analyzed: badzra r'a dza zhes bya'o //
translated: This is what the term “vajrarāja” means.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgom pa ni de'i rjes su mnyes par bya ba ste ;
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgom pa ni de'i rjes su mnyes par bya ba ste ;
translated: The meditation of all tathāgatas is the pleasing of that.

original: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
translated: The gnosis of that is the ascertainment.

original: de'i dbang phyug ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: de'i dbang phyug ni gtso bo ste /
translated: His Lord is the principal one,

original: badzra r'a ga zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra r'a ga zhes bya ba'o //
translated: called Vajraraga.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log cing yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyis te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log cing yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyis te /
translated: The excellent of all the Tathagatas is the unerring, correct way of the conduct of enlightenment,

original: badzra s'a dhu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra s'a dhu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: called Vajrasadhu.🔽The essence of the purity of the three spheres of the perfection of generosity of all the Tathagatas is Ratnasaṃbhava, whose mode is the abandonment of the stain of avarice.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa @33b thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tshul gyis ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni dbang bskur ba chen po de'i don gyis rin po ni bcom ldan
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa @33b thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tshul gyis ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni dbang bskur ba chen po de'i don gyis rin po ni bcom ldan
translated: The great consecration is the essence of that.🔽The meaning of that is the jewel of the Bhagavān,

original: 'das badzra ratna zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'das badzra ratna zhes bya ba'o //
translated: called Vajraratna.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bshad ma thag pa'i de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bshad ma thag pa'i de nyid yin no //
translated: All the Tathagatas are the very ones just explained.

original: de'i ye shes ni mun pa thams cad sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni mun pa thams cad sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: That is the orb of light of the sun of all the Tathagatas.

original: de ni badzra te dza zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni badzra te dza zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is vajra teja.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: That very unobstructed gnosis is all the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi bsam pa ni chos rtogs pa byed par bzhed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsam pa ni chos rtogs pa byed par bzhed pa'o //
translated: Their intention is the desire to realize the Dharma.

original: bsam pa de'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams brnyes pa ni 'bar zhing mdzes pas na bsam ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: bsam pa de'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams brnyes pa ni 'bar zhing mdzes pas na bsam ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: The blazing and beautiful attainment of the qualities of the powers, fearlessnesses, and so forth of that intention is the king of intentions.

original: de las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che des nye bar mtshan pa'i dpal te /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che des nye bar mtshan pa'i dpal te /
translated: The glory marked by that jewel that arises from that is

original: rgyal mtshan gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: the banner on which it exists.

original: badzra ke tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra ke tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is vajra ketu.

original: chos thams cad brnyes pa'i dgyes pa'i tshul skyes pas na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: chos thams cad brnyes pa'i dgyes pa'i tshul skyes pas na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: Since the Tathagata is born with the attitude of delight in attaining all Dharmas, he is called the Tathagata and so on.

original: bzhad pa chen po ni dgyes pa las byung ba'i 'dzum pa gang yin pa de ni bzhad pa chen po'o //
analyzed: bzhad pa chen po ni dgyes pa las byung ba'i 'dzum pa gang yin pa de ni bzhad pa chen po'o //
translated: The great laughter is the smile that arises from the joy.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la bzhad pa chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la bzhad pa chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: All the Tathagatas are also the great laughter,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po ste /
translated: therefore it is the great laughter of all the Tathagatas.

original: badzra h'a sa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra h'a sa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is vajra-hasa.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i tshul ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i tshul ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: The method of the immeasurable light of the mind and mental factors that have the nature of the perfection of wisdom is all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po ste /
translated: The great pure Dharma of all the Tathagatas is the great pure Dharma of all the Tathagatas.

original: badzra dharma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra dharma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is vajra-dharma.

original: gang gi ye shes de de bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes te /
analyzed: gang gi ye shes de de bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes te /
translated: The wisdom which is the great wisdom of all the Tathagatas is the wisdom of the great wisdom of all the Tathagatas.

original: badzra t'ikshna zhes bya ba'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i @34a * //
analyzed: badzra t'ikshna zhes bya ba'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i @34a * //
translated: It is called Vajra Tika.🔽The great mandala in which there is the wheel of all the Tathagatas is the wheel of all the Tathagatas.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po gang la yod pa de ni da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ste badzra he tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po gang la yod pa de ni da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ste badzra he tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called Vajra Hetu.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pas drang ba'i don gyi gsung ston pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pas drang ba'i don gyi gsung ston pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa ste /
translated: The teaching of the meaning of the indirect expressions of the intention of all the Tathagatas is the explanation of the intention of all the Tathagatas.

original: badzra bh'a sha zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra bh'a sha zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called Vajra Vaca.

original: don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis sems la sogs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis sems la sogs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: The nature of Amoghasiddhi, completely pure in the three spheres, is the mind and so forth, by the method of the perfection of effort, of all the tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi gdon me za zhing thams cad de /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gdon me za zhing thams cad de /
translated: That is the commitment of all the tathagatas,

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dgongs pa mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dgongs pa mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa ste /
translated: which is the intention to perform the benefit of sentient beings in various ways and to perform the intention characterized by making offerings to the buddhas.

original: badzra karma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra karma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is the commitment of all the tathagatas, which is the vajra karma.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa'i sems bsrung bar spro ba ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa'i sems bsrung bar spro ba ni /
translated: The protection of the mind that enters into unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment is

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'o //
translated: the great effort of all the tathagatas.

original: de nyid kyi go cha shin tu brtan bo gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan po ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi go cha shin tu brtan bo gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan po ste /
translated: He who has that very firm armor is the one with the very firm armor of the great effort of all the Tathagatas.

original: badzra raksha zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra raksha zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is vajra rakṣa.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
translated: All the Tathagatas are as just explained.

original: de rnams kyi bsrung ba ni gang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar so sor rtogs pas yongs su skyong ba rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa gang yin pa de ni de gnod sbyin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsrung ba ni gang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar so sor rtogs pas yongs su skyong ba rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa gang yin pa de ni de gnod sbyin te /
translated: Their protection is that which protects by the realization that all phenomena are naturally luminous, and is indivisible like a vajra. It is the yakṣa.

original: badzra yaksha zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: badzra yaksha zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is vajra yakṣa.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni ji skad du bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni ji skad du bshad pa ste /
translated: The body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas are as just explained.

original: de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: Since they are indivisible, they are vajras.

original: de bcing ba ni ma skyes pa'i sbyor bas gcig tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bcing ba ni ma skyes pa'i sbyor bas gcig tu byed pa'o //
translated: Binding them is making them one by the yoga of non-arising.

original: de nyid ni phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni phyag rgya ste /
translated: That itself is the seal.

original: de'i ye shes gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i ye shes rnams te /🔽badzra musht'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i ye shes rnams te / badzra musht'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That which has the pristine wisdom of all the transcendent ones’ vajra body, speech, and mind bindings is the vajra fist.

original: 'dis ni badzras tva zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po'i don gyi sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying po'i tshul gang yin pa de bstan nas /
analyzed: 'dis ni badzras tva zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po'i don gyi sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying po'i tshul gang yin pa de bstan nas /
translated: This teaches the meaning of the essence mantras such as vajrasattva, and so on, and the way of the essence mantras such as Vajrasattva, and so on.

original: gzhan yang de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sku'i dbye ba bstan pa ni kun du ba zang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sku'i dbye ba bstan pa ni kun du ba zang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, the way of Vajrasattva, and so on, is taught by the body divisions, such as “Samantabhadra” and so on.

original: 'di las kun nas bzang zhing dge bar gyur pas na kun du @34b bzang po yin pa 'am /
analyzed: 'di las kun nas bzang zhing dge bar gyur pas na kun du @34b bzang po yin pa 'am /
translated: Since this is completely good and virtuous, it is “Samantabhadra” or “Samantabhadra” because it is good in every way.

original: rnam pa thams cad du bzang bas na kun du bzang po ste /🔽snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du bzang bas na kun du bzang po ste / snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang //
translated: Since it is good in every way, it is Samantabhadra.

original: gang phyir sems can don gyur pas /
analyzed: gang phyir sems can don gyur pas /
translated: Since it is the cause of the welfare of sentient beings

original: des na 'di ni kun du bzang //
analyzed: des na 'di ni kun du bzang //
translated: through sattva, it is Samantabhadra.

original: byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: and the one who follows the practice of enlightenment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas rab tu spyan 'dren pa la gdon mi za zhing don yod pas rab tu gdon mi za ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas rab tu spyan 'dren pa la gdon mi za zhing don yod pas rab tu gdon mi za ba'o //
translated: He is Amogha, the unfailing one, because he is unfailing in the invitation of all the Tathagatas.

original: gdul bya rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su blos bsam pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba sgoms pas dar du gcod cing gsod pas na bdud do //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su blos bsam pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba sgoms pas dar du gcod cing gsod pas na bdud do //
translated: He is the Mara-killer because he kills the thought of disciples and hermit buddhas in those to be trained, and he kills the thought of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment in those who are meditating.

original: rab tu dgyes pa ni yid ba ste de brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu dgyes pa ni yid ba ste de brnyes pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has attained the highest delight, because he has attained the highest mental delight.

original: nam mkha' ni mnyan pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni mnyan pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The sky is the knowledge of the sky-like nature.

original: de las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nam mkha' ste nam mkha' zhes bya ba de nyid snying po ste gang gi skyes pa'i gnas yin pa de ni nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nam mkha' ste nam mkha' zhes bya ba de nyid snying po ste gang gi skyes pa'i gnas yin pa de ni nam mkha' ste /
translated: The Tathagatas who have arisen from that are the sky. The sky itself is the essence, the place of his birth.

original: de las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is born from that.

original: shin tu gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pas na shin tu gzi chen te /
analyzed: shin tu gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pas na shin tu gzi chen te /
translated: He is the great splendor because he possesses great splendor.

original: nam mkha' thams cad du khyab pa'i rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pa'i phyir ro //🔽yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po chen nye bar mtshon pa'i tog gi mtshan ma gang la yod pa de ni rin chen dpal lo //
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad du khyab pa'i rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pa'i phyir ro // yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po chen nye bar mtshon pa'i tog gi mtshan ma gang la yod pa de ni rin chen dpal lo //
translated: He is the great look because he looks with a great look.🔽He is the great smile because he has a great smile.🔽He is the great laugh because he has a great laugh.🔽He is the great gaze because he gazes with great eyes.🔽He is the great look because he looks with a great look.🔽He is the great smile because he has a great smile.

original: 'dzum pa chen po mnga' bas na 'dzum pa che ste /
analyzed: 'dzum pa chen po mnga' bas na 'dzum pa che ste /
translated: He is the great laugh because he has a great laugh.🔽He is the great gaze because he gazes with great eyes.🔽He is the great look because he looks with a great look.🔽He is the great smile because he has a great smile.

original: 'dzum zhing bzhad pas na nas nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'o //🔽gti mug spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'am /🔽sems can rnams spyan ras kyis 'tsho bas na kun du gzigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzum zhing bzhad pas na nas nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'o // gti mug spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'am / sems can rnams spyan ras kyis 'tsho bas na kun du gzigs pa'o //
translated: He is the great laugh because he has a great laugh.🔽He is the great gaze because he gazes with great eyes.🔽He is the great look because he looks with a great look.🔽He is the great smile because he has a great smile.🔽He is the great laugh because he has a great laugh.🔽He is the great gaze because he gazes with great eyes.🔽He is the great look because he looks with a great look.🔽He is the great smile because he has a great smile.🔽He is the great laugh because he has a great laugh.🔽He is the great gaze because he gazes with great eyes.🔽He is the great look because he looks with a great look.🔽He is the great smile because he has a great smile.

original: de nyid ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyis rang dbang mnga' bas na dbang chen no //
analyzed: de nyid ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyis rang dbang mnga' bas na dbang chen no //
translated: He is the great laugh because he has a great laugh.

original: kun du gzigs pa yang yin la dbang chen yang yin pas kun du gzigs pa'i dbang chen no //
analyzed: kun du gzigs pa yang yin la dbang chen yang yin pas kun du gzigs pa'i dbang chen no //
translated: He is the Great Seer and also the Great Lord, thus he is the Great Seer and Great Lord.

original: 'jam dpal ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'jam dpal ni bshad zin to //
translated: Mañjuśrī has already been explained.

original: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs bas na /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs bas na /
translated: He is the Lord of all maṇḍalas because he exists in the form of the maṇḍalas of the Vajra Element and so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad do //
translated: He is the Lord of all maṇḍalas.

original: tshig rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bas na mi gsung ba ste /
analyzed: tshig rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bas na mi gsung ba ste /
translated: He is the Unspeakable One because he is free from discursive elaborations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsung gis spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyor ba'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //🔽ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i @35a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsung gis spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyor ba'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro // ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i @35a * //
translated: He is the one who definitely joins all the Tathāgatas to the reality of the unelaborated Dharma by means of the vajra speech of all the Tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las mdzad pas na thams cad las so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las mdzad pas na thams cad las so //
translated: He is the one who performs the activity of worship of all the Tathāgatas without exception.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par spro ba'i brtson 'grus chen po 'di la mnga' bas na brtson 'grus so //🔽gtum pas na ma rungs pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par spro ba'i brtson 'grus chen po 'di la mnga' bas na brtson 'grus so // gtum pas na ma rungs pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has great diligence in the unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.🔽He is the one who is fierce.

original: mi phyed pas na dam pa'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pas na dam pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is firm.

original: de nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu byas ba'i khu tshur gyi tshul can yin pas na dam du gzung ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu byas ba'i khu tshur gyi tshul can yin pas na dam du gzung ba ste /
translated: Since that is the manner of a fist made of a single body, speech, and mind, it is tightly held.

original: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of “vajra fist.”

original: tshig 'di dag gis ni go rems bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' bcu drug po de dag gi sku'i gsang ba gsungs pa yin no //🔽'di dag ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yang de dag nyid yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tshig 'di dag gis ni go rems bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' bcu drug po de dag gi sku'i gsang ba gsungs pa yin no // 'di dag ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yang de dag nyid yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: By these words, the secret of the body of those sixteen beings beginning with Vajrasattva is stated, in order.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to teach that those very [beings] are the emblems such as the vajra, [the Bhagavān] declares, the vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje snga pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag mtshan nyid yin te gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snga pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag mtshan nyid yin te gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: The former vajra is the emblem of the Bhagavān Vajrasattva, and the others should be understood in the same way.

original: rgyud pas 'di dag gi phyag mtshan smos pa ni 'og nas kyang ston to //
analyzed: rgyud pas 'di dag gi phyag mtshan smos pa ni 'og nas kyang ston to //
translated: The emblems of these [beings] are taught below as well, by the root text.

original: sems dpa' chen po bcu drug po 'di dag ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin par ni ston to //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po bcu drug po 'di dag ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin par ni ston to //
translated: These sixteen great beings are shown to be the very essence of the mysteries of the body, speech, and mind of Great Vairocana.

original: thog ma tha ma med cing zhi /
analyzed: thog ma tha ma med cing zhi /
translated: Without beginning or end, peaceful,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
translated: and so on.

original: de nyid chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gsungs so //
translated: That very [nature] is said to be the nature of the dharmadhatu, and so on.

original: de la thog ma ni dang por skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de la thog ma ni dang por skyes pa'o //
translated: Among them, beginning is the first arising.

original: tha ma ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: tha ma ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: End is the nirvana of the sravakas and pratyekabuddhas, which lacks rebirth.

original: gang la 'di dag mi mnga' ba de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
analyzed: gang la 'di dag mi mnga' ba de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
translated: That which lacks these is without beginning or end.

original: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i sems las byung ba gnyis su med pa'i rang zhin chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i sems las byung ba gnyis su med pa'i rang zhin chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the nature of the non-dual mind, which has one taste in suchness. It is synonymous with the dharmadhatu.

original: rgyu 'di nyid kyis ni zhing zhes bya ba dang / zhi ba'i tshul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu 'di nyid kyis ni zhing zhes bya ba dang / zhi ba'i tshul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: For this very reason, he is the “field” and, because he teaches the Dharma in order to discipline those sentient beings who are to be disciplined by the method of peace,

original: zhi ba'i sku ston par mdzad pas na zhi ba'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'i sku ston par mdzad pas na zhi ba'o //
translated: he is peaceful.

analyzed: srin pos 'di la ba rnams la ni srin po dam pa'o //

analyzed: brtan bos 'dul ba rnams la ni brtan pa'o //

original: de'i mgon po ni bsrung ba'o //

original: sems can don rab mdzad do //🔽dngos po thams cad kyi chos nyid du gyur pas na thams cad do //
analyzed: sems can don rab mdzad do //🔽dngos po thams cad kyi chos nyid du gyur pas na thams cad do //
translated: He acts for the sake of all sentient beings.🔽He is all because he is the reality of all things.

original: gu lang ste lha chen po'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na gu lang ngo /
analyzed: gu lang ste lha chen po'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na gu lang ngo /
translated: He is Guhyaka because he assumes the form of Guhyaka, the great god.

original: tshangs pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pas na tshangs pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pas na tshangs pa'o //
translated: He is Brahma because he dwells in the form of Brahma.

original: chags pa dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i tshul gyis sems can 'dul bar mdzad pa dang / skye ba med pa'i sbyor bas 'khor ba'i chos nyid yin pas na 'kho @36a * //

translated: He is Cakra because he is the reality of cyclic existence, since he is the one who tames sentient beings by the method of the ages of creation and destruction, and since he is the one who is not born.

original: ba'o ; / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin pas na mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: ba'o ; / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin pas na mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: He is Nirvana because he is non-abiding nirvana.

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis brtag pa'am rtag pas na rtag pa'o //

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa mnga' bas na yang dag 'tsho ba'o //
translated: He is Right-living because he possesses the conduct of the ten perfections.

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis mchod pa chen po yin pas na mchod pa chen po'o //🔽sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na sangs rgyas te /

original: rang nyid sangs rgyas rab bsgoms pas //
analyzed: rang nyid sangs rgyas rab bsgoms pas //
translated: Since he himself is the meditation on the Buddha,

original: sangs rgyas zhes ni bya ba yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes ni bya ba yin //
translated: He is called the Buddha.

original: zhes bstan pas so //
analyzed: zhes bstan pas so //
translated: Thus it is taught.

analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pas na dga' ba'o //
translated: Since he is the essence of the lotus family, he is the essence of discerning wisdom, and so he is Delight.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Since he is the essence of the path of the bodhisattva together with its result, he is the Great Vehicle.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su yang dag par ston pa dang / de'i chos nyid kyis na srid gsum mo //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su yang dag par ston pa dang / de'i chos nyid kyis na srid gsum mo //
translated: Since he manifests in the desire, form, and formless realms, he is the three existences.

original: rtag pa ni lha chen po'i gzugs te der ston pas na rtag pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa ni lha chen po'i gzugs te der ston pas na rtag pa'o //
translated: Since he manifests in the form of the great god, he is the eternal.

analyzed: dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal lo //

analyzed: bde spyod mgon po'o //

analyzed: yi ge h'um gcig pu tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum 'dul bar mdzad pas na rab tu 'dul mdzad do //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag po yin pas na rdo rje gtso bo'o //

analyzed: sa rab ni mos pa spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa ste de rnams kyi mchog ni rdo rje 'chang gi sa yin la /
translated: The stages are the stage of faithful practice, and so on. The best of those is the stage of Vajradhara.

original: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sa rab chog go //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sa rab chog go //
translated: Since he has that as his nature, he is the Best of Stages.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ni ye shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ni ye shes so //
translated: By the method of the Dharma maṇḍala, he is the Gnosis.

analyzed: ye shes yin pa nyid kyis na pha rol tu phyin pa bcu drug thob pa'i thabs su gyur pas na /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul lo //

analyzed: ji ltar na ye shes nyid yin pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul yin zhes na /

translated: From that time on, whatever

analyzed: de dag thams cad brtan 'gyur te /

analyzed: gsangs sngags kyi spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na spyod pa'o //

analyzed: nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin yin pas na sangs rgyas don no //

analyzed: nyan thos dang rang byang chub dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos nyid yin pas na byang chub kun no //

analyzed: 'di'i gong na yod pa ma yin pas na bla na med pa'o /

original: rnam par snang mdzad ni ji ltar grags pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ni ji ltar grags pa nyid do //
translated: Vairocana is as well known as he is.

original: bdud las rgyal bas na rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: bdud las rgyal bas na rgyal ba'o //
translated: He is the Victor because he is victorious over Mara.

original: sems can gyi tshogs chen po'i don mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi tshogs chen po'i don mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //

analyzed: phyag rgya chen po mnga' na phyag rgya chen po ste / gang phyir sems ni bcom ldan 'das //
translated: He is the Great Seal because he possesses the Great Seal.🔽The mind is the Bhagavat,🔽because of the statement: “The mind is the Buddha, the mind is the Dharma, the mind is the Sangha.

original: 'dod chags na gzugs so //
analyzed: 'dod chags na gzugs so //
translated: The mind is the Bhagavat, the mind is the Dharma-realm.”

original: dmigs pa bsnyel ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa bsnyel ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na rgyal ba'o //
translated: He is the Victor because he is the nature of the non-forgetfulness of the objective support.

original: rigs bzhi'i bdag por gyur pas na mgon no //
analyzed: rigs bzhi'i bdag por gyur pas na mgon no //
translated: He is the lord of the four castes, thus he is the protector.

original: rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas nan rang byung ngo //
analyzed: rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas nan rang byung ngo //
translated: He is self-originated, since he is fully enlightened by himself.

original: rigs bzhi'i 'dzin par mdzad pa'i rang zhin yin pas chen po 'di yi lha //
analyzed: rigs bzhi'i 'dzin par mdzad pa'i rang zhin yin pas chen po 'di yi lha //
translated: He is the great one, since he is the nature of the holder of the four castes.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyi ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyi ro //
translated: This is the external mantra.

original: sems dpa' dang phyag rgya chen po de dang 'brel ba'i bdag med pa bsgoms pas sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: sems dpa' dang phyag rgya chen po de dang 'brel ba'i bdag med pa bsgoms pas sems rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The hero and the great seal are the concentration of the one-pointed mind through the meditation on selflessness which is related to them.

analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pas ring nge 'dzin yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phrin las ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las te /

analyzed: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is the characteristic of the worship of the thought of enlightenment, etc.

original: des mdzad pas na sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad do /
analyzed: des mdzad pas na sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad do /
translated: The buddhas perform the activity, since they perform it.
