original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni shes rab bo //
translated: Discerning wisdom is wisdom.

original: des lam gyi tshul gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing /
analyzed: des lam gyi tshul gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing /
translated: By that, through the method of the path, all afflictions are abandoned.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa ni rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa ni rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: The manifest enlightenment of the equality of all tathāgatas is liberation.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes ni /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes ni /
translated: The wisdom of the maṇḍala of all buddha families, such as Vajrasattva,

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o //
translated: is the vision of the wisdom of liberation.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul @50a* //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o // rdzu 'phrul @50a* //
translated: Then, the emanation of the maṇḍala is the turning of the wheel of the sublime Dharma.🔽The purification of all sentient beings through various miracles

original: dang cho 'phral sna tshogs kyis sems can thams cad rnam par sbyong ba ni sems can gyi don no //
analyzed: dang cho 'phral sna tshogs kyis sems can thams cad rnam par sbyong ba ni sems can gyi don no //
translated: and magical displays is the benefit of sentient beings.

original: bcos ma'i khro bo yang dag par ston pa ni thabs chen po ste /
analyzed: bcos ma'i khro bo yang dag par ston pa ni thabs chen po ste /
translated: The display of the artificial wrathful ones is the great method,

original: thabs chen po'i ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs chen po'i ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to teach the samādhi called the great method wisdom commitment vajra.

original: de nyid gdug pa thams cad tshar gcod par sbyor pas stobs so //
analyzed: de nyid gdug pa thams cad tshar gcod par sbyor pas stobs so //
translated: Since it is applied to destroy all evil, it is power.

original: rta mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur pas brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: rta mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur pas brtson 'grus so //
translated: Since it has the form of the supreme horse and so forth, it is effort.

original: tshig re rer thams cad bdag yin par bya ba'i ye shes chen po'o //
analyzed: tshig re rer thams cad bdag yin par bya ba'i ye shes chen po'o //
translated: Since each word is the great wisdom of the self, it is wisdom.

original: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang /
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang /
translated: Thus, it is the morality, concentration, wisdom, liberation, and knowledge of liberation of all tathāgatas, the turning of the wheel of dharma, the benefit of sentient beings,

original: thabs chen po dang / stobs chen po dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po ste /
analyzed: thabs chen po dang / stobs chen po dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po ste /
translated: great method, great power, effort, and great wisdom.

original: de rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na /
analyzed: de rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na /
translated: Since it is the cause of generating those,

original: rdo rje ni dam tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje ni dam tshig go //
translated: the vajra is the commitment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhes na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhes na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems cad kyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sems cad kyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is stated, “the realm of sentient beings,” and so on.

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: The protection of all sentient beings without exception is mundane and supramundane.

original: de yang bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: de yang bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
translated: And all happiness is mundane and supramundane.

original: yid bde ba thams cad ni dga' ba ste de dag kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: yid bde ba thams cad ni dga' ba ste de dag kyang de bzhin no //
translated: All mental joy is delight, and that is just so.

original: de rjes su myong bar bya ba ni mngon sum du bya ba ste /
analyzed: de rjes su myong bar bya ba ni mngon sum du bya ba ste /
translated: The experience of that is the actualization of that.

original: de'i don du rjes su sbyin no //
analyzed: de'i don du rjes su sbyin no //
translated: For that purpose, I will give.

original: ji srid ces bya ba'i sgras ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang bsdu'o //
analyzed: ji srid ces bya ba'i sgras ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang bsdu'o //
translated: The word “even” includes the other stages, perfections, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs te /
translated: The sameness of all the Tathāgatas is the mind of Akṣhobhya, etc.

original: de'i ye shes ni mngon par rtogs pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni mngon par rtogs pa'o ;
translated: His intuition is the realization.

original: / mngon par shes pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i mngon par shes pa drug nyid do //
analyzed: / mngon par shes pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i mngon par shes pa drug nyid do //
translated: The superknowledges are the six superknowledges as previously explained.

original: ya shes dang mngon par shes pa drug nyid ni bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: ya shes dang mngon par shes pa drug nyid ni bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: The six higher knowledges and superknowledges are the unsurpassed Great Vehicle.

original: de mngon par rtogs pa ni thugs su chud pa'o //🔽de nyid ni grub pa'i mchog ste /
analyzed: de mngon par rtogs pa ni thugs su chud pa'o // de nyid ni grub pa'i mchog ste /
translated: The realization of that is the understanding.🔽That itself is the supreme accomplishment.

original: dngos grub kyi @50b mchog ge //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi @50b mchog ge //
translated: It is the supreme accomplishment.

original: de thob pa ni bsnyes pa'o //
analyzed: de thob pa ni bsnyes pa'o //
translated: The attainment of that is the bestowal.

original: de nyid ni 'bras bu ste de dag gi rgyu'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje byin pa ni stsal ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'bras bu ste de dag gi rgyu'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje byin pa ni stsal ba'o //
translated: That itself is the fruit, because it is the cause of those. The bestowal of the vajra accomplishment of all the Tathagatas is the giving.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: ji srid rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa thog par bya ba'i phyir de'i lag par byin no //
analyzed: ji srid rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa thog par bya ba'i phyir de'i lag par byin no //
translated: As long as one has not attained the knowledge and superknowledge of Vajrasattva, the vajra is given into one’s hand in order to attain it.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Regarding “the great bodhisattva,” etc.,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bur gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bur gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
translated: the wheel of all the Tathagatas is the maṇḍalas taught in the Vajra Realm section.

original: 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor zhas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor zhas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is called a “wheel” because it is said to be a maṇḍala.

original: de sgyur nga'i dang tshul 'di la mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: de sgyur nga'i dang tshul 'di la mnga' ba ste /
translated: He is the master of this method of transformation.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la sprul pa dang bri ba'i chogs thun mong du bya ba'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la sprul pa dang bri ba'i chogs thun mong du bya ba'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na /
translated: Because he has the nature of that, in order to perform the common function of emanating and withdrawing in the continuums of all sentient beings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du'o //
translated: he is the universal monarch of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du bya ba des kyang ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du bya ba des kyang ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: What does he do by being the universal monarch of all the Tathagatas?

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He is the universal monarch of all the Tathagatas,

original: rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'o //
translated: the body of Vairochana, Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, and Amoghasiddhi is the body of all the Buddhas.

original: de nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur pas na rin po che'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur pas na rin po che'o //
translated: That itself is a jewel, because it is the cause for the fulfillment of the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: de dang ldan pa'i dbu rgyan ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan no //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i dbu rgyan ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan no //
translated: The crown that possesses that is the jeweled crown of all Buddhas.

original: des dbang bskur ba ni de lta bu'i dbu rgyan /
analyzed: des dbang bskur ba ni de lta bu'i dbu rgyan /
translated: The consecration with that is the consecration with such a crown.

original: de'i dbu la bzhag nas /
analyzed: de'i dbu la bzhag nas /
translated: Having placed that on his head,

original: dar dkar po zhang du khru gang la /
analyzed: dar dkar po zhang du khru gang la /
translated: the consecration with the white silk ribbon, one cubit long,🔽twenty cubits in length, having bound it, the consecration is conferred.🔽The vajra is given into his hand.

original: dkyus khru nyi shu ba bcings pa'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas rdo rje de de'i lag tu byin no zhes bya ba la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur dril bu dang bcas pa ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: dkyus khru nyi shu ba bcings pa'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas rdo rje de de'i lag tu byin no zhes bya ba la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur dril bu dang bcas pa ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje ste /
translated: The left vajra fist with the bell is the left vajra.

original: de kha nang du bstan par g-yon pa'i rked pa'i phyogs su ba dan te bzhag pa ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pa'o //
analyzed: de kha nang du bstan par g-yon pa'i rked pa'i phyogs su ba dan te bzhag pa ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pa'o //
translated: That, facing inward, placed at the left hip, is the left vajra extended.🔽Having remained with that, the right hand is raised and held, therefore, by the throwing itself.

original: des bzhugs nas phyag g-yas pa 'degs shing 'dzin par mdzad pas na gsor ba nyid kyis te nges rdo rje de zhes bya ba gang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis stsal @51a * //
analyzed: des bzhugs nas phyag g-yas pa 'degs shing 'dzin par mdzad pas na gsor ba nyid kyis te nges rdo rje de zhes bya ba gang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis stsal @51a * //
translated: The vajra that is given by the Bhagavat Vairocana,

original: ba gang yin pa de thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba rang gi thugs ka'i gnas su sor mo gsum bsgreng ba'i gung mo la rdo rje de kha gyen du blta bar 'jog ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing 'chang ngo //
analyzed: ba gang yin pa de thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba rang gi thugs ka'i gnas su sor mo gsum bsgreng ba'i gung mo la rdo rje de kha gyen du blta bar 'jog ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing 'chang ngo //
translated: The vajra is the one that is at the heart, in the manner of praise, that is, in the place of the heart, holding it in the manner of placing the three extended fingers, with the middle finger having the vajra placed upon it, facing upward.

original: 'di zhes bya ba thugs la gzhag par mdzad nas 'di skad gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba thugs la gzhag par mdzad nas 'di skad gsungs so //
translated: Having placed it in the heart, he said this:

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra of all the buddhas is Vairochana and so forth.

original: grub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i phyir dang dngos grub kyi rang bzhin yin pas so //
analyzed: grub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i phyir dang dngos grub kyi rang bzhin yin pas so //
translated: The accomplished vajra is because of accomplishment and because of being the nature of powers.

original: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The unsurpassed is because of being the highest.

original: stong ba nyid ni rdo rjer bshad //🔽ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong ba nyid ni rdo rjer bshad // ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The vajra is explained as emptiness.🔽Because of the statement, The vajra is the nature of emptiness,

original: rigs lnga'i stong ba nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni phul du byung ba yin pas so //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i stong ba nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni phul du byung ba yin pas so //
translated: and because of being the nature of the exalted wisdom of emptiness of the five families, it is unsurpassed.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis stsal ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis stsal ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is what was bestowed by Vairochana.

original: bdag ste zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gang yin pa de ni bdag yin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ste zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gang yin pa de ni bdag yin pa'o //
translated: “I am the vajra” means that the vajra is myself.

original: bdag gi lag tu byin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdag gi lag tu byin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “You have given it to my hand” means

original: bdag gi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje'i gzugs gang yin pa de bdag gi lag tu byin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje'i gzugs gang yin pa de bdag gi lag tu byin pa'o //
translated: that the vajra form that has the nature of myself has been given to my hand.

original: de lta yin pa des na bdag rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin pa des na bdag rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since that is the case, “the vajra abides in the vajra” means that the vajra abides in myself.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gdul bya rnams byang chub kyi sems rab tu gzhag pa'i don du /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gdul bya rnams byang chub kyi sems rab tu gzhag pa'i don du /
translated: Thus, the Bhagavān, in order to establish the disciples of Śrī Vajrasattva in the thought of awakening,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bskul ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin mngon du mdzad pa dang / de'i ched du brjod pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / ye shes kyi rdo rje dang / rdo rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bskul ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin mngon du mdzad pa dang / de'i ched du brjod pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / ye shes kyi rdo rje dang / rdo rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
translated: manifested meditative concentration in order to exhort Vajrasattva, and in order to do that, he emitted the moon maṇḍala, the gnosis vajra, and the great vajra light rays, which summoned the tathāgatas,

original: sems can gyi don dang / kun du bzang po dang / de'i ched du /
analyzed: sems can gyi don dang / kun du bzang po dang / de'i ched du /
translated: and the light rays that benefit sentient beings and Samantabhadra, and in order to do that,

original: brjod pa dang / bka' nod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / rdzogs pa'i ched du brjod pas bskyed pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / gnas pa dang / brtan par bsgom pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa dang / bka' nod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / rdzogs pa'i ched du brjod pas bskyed pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / gnas pa dang / brtan par bsgom pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: and the generation by means of the declaration, the command, the consecration, the declaration of completion, the emission, the gathering, the abiding, and the firm meditation.

original: de ltar tshul 'dis dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'dul ba'i rang bzhin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems su gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar tshul 'dis dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'dul ba'i rang bzhin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems su gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Thus, by this method, the nature of the discipline of glorious Vajrasattva is established as the thought of enlightenment of all the Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: rdo rje rgyal pos 'gugs pa yin pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal pos 'gugs pa yin pas na /
translated: Since the Vajra King is the summoner,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: then he says, “Then, etc.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: “Then, the Vanquisher” is Vairochana.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gzhan yang zhes bya @51b ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gzhan yang zhes bya @51b ba'i don to //
translated: The word “also” means “furthermore.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la /
translated: The great bodhisattva, the King of Certainty,

original: gdon mi za ba yang yin la rgyal po yang yin pas na gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba yang yin la rgyal po yang yin pas na gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: is the King of Certainty because he is both certain and a king.

original: de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas par gang sdar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas par gang sdar bshad pa'o //
translated: He is the great bodhisattva, who is explained as abiding in the heart of all the Tathagatas in the form of a five-pronged vajra upon a moon-disc mandala, which has the characteristic of great enlightenment.

original: gdon mi za ba ni don yod ba'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba ni don yod ba'o //
translated: The unfailing is the unfailing.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa rdo rje rgyal po'i gzugs kyis de nyid mdzes shing 'bar ba'i gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa rdo rje rgyal po'i gzugs kyis de nyid mdzes shing 'bar ba'i gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i //
translated: The unfailing king is the form of the Vajra King who invites all the Tathagatas, who is beautiful and blazing with the splendor of the unfailing king.

original: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'o //
translated: His commitment is the manifestation of all forms such as the vajra hook, etc.

original: gang gi phyir de las byung bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de las byung bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Because he arises from that, etc., is as before.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam par sprul ba bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam par sprul ba bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has the form of Vajra Hook and so on, and who has the nature of the emanation of the creation stage.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba la /
translated: The pledge of summoning all the Ones-Gone-Thus is

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba ni spyan 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba ni spyan 'dren pa'o //
translated: the summoning of all the Ones-Gone-Thus, such as Vairochana.

original: de nyid ni dam tshig ste rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni dam tshig ste rgyu'o //
translated: That itself is the pledge, the cause.

original: ming de skad ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa de rang gi thugs ka nas rang nyid kyis phyung bar gyur pa ni badzra r'a dze zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa de rang gi thugs ka nas rang nyid kyis phyung bar gyur pa ni badzra r'a dze zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The essence of all Ones-Gone-Thus with that name, Vajra Raja, having emerged from his heart center, is Vajra Raja.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From the heart centers of all Ones-Gone-Thus means

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka nas so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka nas so //
translated: from the heart centers of the five Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: phyung ma thag pa zhes bya ba ni sgra'i gzugs so //
analyzed: phyung ma thag pa zhes bya ba ni sgra'i gzugs so //
translated: Having just emerged means having the form of the sound.

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The Bhagavān Vajrapāṇi himself means

original: gang sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis byung ba de nyid /🔽de ni rdo rje lcags kyu lta bur byung bar gyur nas phyag//
analyzed: gang sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis byung ba de nyid / de ni rdo rje lcags kyu lta bur byung bar gyur nas phyag//
translated: that the one who previously arose in the form of a moon maṇḍala and so on

original: gnyis su gnas so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
analyzed: gnyis su gnas so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
translated: arose in the form of a vajra hook and remained in his two hands.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen po ste /
translated: The great hook of all tathāgatas

original: lcags kyu tshad med pa'i gzugs su gyur cing grub pa ste /
analyzed: lcags kyu tshad med pa'i gzugs su gyur cing grub pa ste /
translated: is the form of the immeasurable hook that has arisen and is accomplished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka nas byung nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka nas byung nas /
translated: Having arisen from the hearts of the five tathāgatas,🔽it entered the heart of the Bhagavān Vairocana.

original: @52a * // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su bzhugs te sngar bshad pa'i nyid kyis gcig tu 'dres nas /
analyzed: @52a * // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su bzhugs te sngar bshad pa'i nyid kyis gcig tu 'dres nas /
translated: Having become a single being through the previously explained [mantra],

original: rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur cing byung nas /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur cing byung nas /
translated: it became the form of a great vajra hook, the nature of vajra, and arose.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste /
translated: Having been drawn forth from the heart of the Bhagavān Vairocana,

original: de nyid kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so //
translated: it remained in his two hands.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa byas nas thugs kar gnas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa byas nas thugs kar gnas te /
translated: Having invited all the Tathagatas, etc., they abide in the heart.

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is the utterance of the utterance.🔽Then, from that great hook-shape, etc.

original: de nas lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag na gnas pa nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang
analyzed: de nas lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag na gnas pa nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang
translated: means that from the hands of Vairochana, the bodies of all the Tathagatas equal to the atoms of all world systems, etc.

original: mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa'i sku rnams byung zhing 'thon par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa'i sku rnams byung zhing 'thon par gyur pa'o //
translated: means that from the bodies of Vairochana, Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, and Amoghasiddhi, they emerge and come forth.

original: des ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: What do they do?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: They invite all the Tathagatas, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa ni 'di'i las kyi gtso bo yin par ston la de la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa ni 'di'i las kyi gtso bo yin par ston la de la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs
translated: The miracles and magical emanations of all the Buddhas, such as the invocation of all the Tathagatas, etc.,

original: rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams so //
analyzed: rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams so //
translated: are the miracles and magical emanations of all the Buddhas.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bsdus te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bsdus te /
translated: The word “etc.” includes the generation of the will to enlightenment, etc.

original: de rnams byas nas so //
analyzed: de rnams byas nas so //
translated: Having performed all those,🔽the samadhi of Vajrasattva is called the “extremely invincible king.”

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la shin tu gdon mi za zhing don yod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la shin tu gdon mi za zhing don yod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i rang bzhin /
translated: It is extremely invincible and unfailing, the nature of the invocation of all the Tathagatas,

original: rdo rje rgyal po'i gzugs su 'di las 'gyur bas na shin tu gdon mi za ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po'i gzugs su 'di las 'gyur bas na shin tu gdon mi za ba'o //
translated: since it arises from this in the form of Vajraraja.

original: de nyid kyis ni rgyal po ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni rgyal po ste /
translated: It is a king because of that.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na rgyal po de nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na rgyal po de nyid do //
translated: It is the king because it is their very essence.

original: de ltar shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid do //
translated: Thus, it is the king without a doubt.

original: gang gi yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi yin zhe na /
translated: Whose?

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The samadhi of Vajrasattva.

original: lngar ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge @52b 'dzin to //
analyzed: lngar ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge @52b 'dzin to //
translated: In the five, it is the samadhi of Vajrasattva.

original: rgyu de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad gcig tu gyur pa las rdo rje rgyal po'i lus gcig tu gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad gcig tu gyur pa las rdo rje rgyal po'i lus gcig tu gyur ro //
translated: From that cause, all those bodies of Tathagatas become one, and from that one, the body of Vajraraja is born.

original: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir yang rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te /
analyzed: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir yang rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te /
translated: It is also the samadhi of Vajrasattva because it is extremely firm.

original: gang gi rdo rje'i rang bzhin khong stong ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi rdo rje'i rang bzhin khong stong ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is the vajra of which the body is not hollow.
